title: Re: 3a XL Suggest you have option to set phone to auto-answer after 1st or 2nd ring
content:
My previous phone had a setting that allowed you to have the phone automatically answer after the first or second ring.  That way you could take a call without ever touching the phone. This feature is useful for those who wear Bluetooth headsets or hearing aids with Bluetooth built-in.
   I did find an app that would do this.
